name: programming-assignments-helpers
description: A collection of helper scripts for working with programming assignments

scripts.test: pushd js-assessment && npx mocha -R spec tests/app && popd
scripts.test:pa1: pushd js-assessment && npx mocha -R spec tests/app/arrays.js tests/app/bestPractices.js && popd
scripts.eject:pa1: echo 'Copying solutions for Programming Assignment 1' && shx mkdir -p pa1 && shx cp -u js-assessment/app/arrays.js pa1/arrays.js && shx cp -u js-assessment/app/bestPractices.js pa1/bestPractices.js
scripts.stage:pa1: echo 'Staging solutions for Programming Assignment 1' && shx cp -u pa1/arrays.js js-assessment/app/arrays.js  && shx cp -u pa1/bestPractices.js js-assessment/app/bestPractices.js
